622290.name: 1 multi screen media player gallery video wall photo slideshow wizard app
622290.description:
Surround yourself with multiple screens of image slideshows and video players.
Try it out to see how it runs and what’s currently supported; if a feature you want isn't there, I hope you check back later.

Feedback? Questions? Chat?:

Visit and to find the source videos and images featured in the screenshots and trailer


Controls
  • Trigger:
    • Select and Show/Hide UI
    • Point at a video and drag to scrub the timeline
  • Grip: Drag screen
  • SteamVR Menu Button || Oculus Button A or X
    • Create, Clone, and Close a screen
      • Create: point at nothing and press
      • Clone: drag screen and press
      • Close: point at screen and hold down until closed
  • SteamVR Trackpad Button || Oculus Thumbstick Button
    • Recenter
